column3: Latest;Kampong Spue: 164 people in “Master Club” were given an on the spot urine test for drugs
column4: with 30 people testing positive.------A Kompong Speu provincial police officer said that a large-scale operation had been launched to crack down on the Master Club and at first officers detained 164 people and made them take urine tests to find drugs.------The operation
column5: which took place at around 1 am on December 1
column6: was overseen by police forces at the Anti-Narcotics Office
column7: in collaboration with the police force of Chbar Mon City.------Of the 164 people (62 women) who were taken for urine tests
column8: 30 (7 women) showed evidence of drug use and were arrested. ------NKD
